224: 00000000 <= sent by us
225: 11000000
     aabbbbbb
226: 00111111
     bbcccccc
227: 11000000
     ccdddddd

a = 20µs high pulse
b = 80µs low pulse
c = 80µs high pulse
d = 60µs low part of first data bit

228: 11000000
     ee

e = 20µs high part of first data bit

=> first bit is a '0'

229: 11000000
0

230: 11000000
0

231: 11000000
0

232: 11000000
0

233: 11000000
0

234: 11000000
0

235: 11111110
1

236: 00000011
237: 11111000
1

238: 00111000
0

239: 00111000
0

240: 00011000
0

241: 00011000
0

242: 00011000
0

243: 00011111
244: 11000001
1

245: 11000000
0

246: 01100000
0

247: 01100000
0

248: 01100000
0

249: 01100000
0

250: 01100000
0

251: 01100000
0

252: 01100000
0

253: 01111111
1

254: 00000001
255: 10000001
0

256: 10000001
0

257: 10000001
0

258: 10000001
0

259: 11111100
1

260: 00001100
0

261: 00001100
0

262: 00001111
263: 11100000
1

start checksum
264: 01111111
265: 10000011
1

266: 10000011
0

267: 10000011
0

268: 10000011
0

269: 11111000
1

270: 00011111
271: 11000000
1

272: 11000000
0

273: 11111110
1

274: 00001111
275: 11111111
276: 11111111
277: 11111111
278: 11111111
279: 11111111
280: 11111111
281: 11111111
282: 11111111
283: 11111111
284: 11111111


40 bits
0000.0001 => 0x01 (humidity integer)
1000.0010 => 0x82 (humidity decimal)
0000.0001 => 0x01 (temp integer)
0000.1001 => 0x09 (temp decimal)
1000.1101 => 0x8D (checksum)

checksum = (t1 + t2 + h1 + h2) % 256 => 0x8D CORRECT!

temp = (t1 * 256 + t2) / 10     => 26.5 °C => CORRECT!
humidity = (h1 * 256 + h2) / 10 => 38.6  % => CORRECT!

From Adafruit Driver: Temp=26.5*  Humidity=38.6%
